languages.text: {n}Вы проламываете монитор одним ударом. В ответ машина, словно испустив последнее дыхание, обволакивает вас едким дымом, который оставляет тонкую маслянистую пленку. Когти, зажимавшие инфокрипту, дергаются в агонии, разламывая хрупкую деталь в металлические щепки.{/n}

{n}You shatter the monitor with a single blow. In its death thralls, the machine envelops you in acrid smoke that leaves behind a thin oily film. The claws holding the data-crypt twitch in agony, breaking the fragile device into metal splinters.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы проламываете монитор одним ударом. В ответ машина, словно испустив последнее дыхание, обволакивает вас едким дымом, который оставляет тонкую маслянистую пленку. Когти, зажимавшие инфокрипту, дергаются в агонии, разламывая хрупкую деталь в металлические щепки.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You shatter the monitor with a single blow. In response the machine envelops you in an acrid smoke that leaves behind a thin oily film, as if giving up the ghost. The claws holding the cybercrypt twitch in agony, breaking the fragile device into metallic scrap.{/n}

{n}You shatter the monitor with a single blow. In response the machine envelops you in an acrid smoke that leaves behind a thin oily film, as if giving up the ghost. The claws holding the cybercrypt twitch in agony, breaking the fragile device into metallic scrap.{/n}

{n}You shatter the monitor with a single blow. In its death thralls, the machine envelops you in acrid smoke that leaves behind a thin oily film. The claws holding the cybercrypt twitch in agony, breaking the fragile device into metal splinters.{/n}

{n}You shatter the monitor with a single blow. In its death thralls, the machine envelops you in acrid smoke that leaves behind a thin oily film. The claws holding the cybercrypt twitch in agony, breaking the fragile device into metal splinters.{/n}

{n}You shatter the monitor with a single blow. In its death thralls, the machine envelops you in acrid smoke that leaves behind a thin oily film. The claws holding the data-crypt twitch in agony, breaking the fragile device into metal splinters.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你一击打碎了显示器。沉思者发出了垂死的惨叫，散发出刺鼻的烟雾，将你笼罩其中，在你身上留下了一层薄薄的油膜。握着数据密存器的金属爪痛苦地抽搐着，将脆弱的密存器撕成了碎片。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You shatter the monitor with a single blow. In its death thralls, the machine envelops you in acrid smoke that leaves behind a thin oily film. The claws holding the data-crypt twitch in agony, breaking the fragile device into metal splinters.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你一击打碎了显示器。思考器发出了垂死的惨叫，散发出刺鼻的烟雾，将你笼罩其中，在你身上留下了一层薄薄的油膜。握着数据密存器的金属爪痛苦地抽搐着，将脆弱的密存器撕成了碎片。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Haces añicos el monitor con un solo golpe. En sus últimos estertores, la máquina te cubre de un humo ácido que deja una fina película aceitosa. Las garras que sujetan la cripta de datos se retuercen, agónicas, haciendo pedazos el delicado dispositivo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You shatter the monitor with a single blow. In its death thralls, the machine envelops you in acrid smoke that leaves behind a thin oily film. The claws holding the data-crypt twitch in agony, breaking the fragile device into metal splinters.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Haces añicos el monitor con un solo golpe. En sus últimos estertores, la máquina te cubre de un humo ácido que deja una fina película aceitosa. Las garras que sujetan la cripta de datos se retuercen, agónicas, haciendo pedazos el delicado dispositivo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}一撃でモニターを粉々にする。機械は死を恐れて、ツンと鼻を刺す煙をこちらへと吹きかけ、刺激性の薄い膜を残す。データ・クリプトを持つ爪が苦しみつつピクピクと動き、繊細な装置は壊れて金属の破片になった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You shatter the monitor with a single blow. In its death thralls, the machine envelops you in acrid smoke that leaves behind a thin oily film. The claws holding the data-crypt twitch in agony, breaking the fragile device into metal splinters.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}一撃でモニターを粉々にする。機械は死を恐れて、ツンと鼻を刺す煙をこちらへと吹きかけ、刺激性の薄い膜を残す。データ・クリプトを持つ爪が苦しみつつピクピクと動き、繊細な装置は壊れて金属の破片になった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du zerschmetterst den Monitor mit einem einzigen Schlag. In ihren Todeszuckungen taucht die Maschine dich in beißenden Rauch, der einen dünnen öligen Film zurücklässt. Die Klauen, die die Daten-Krypta festhalten, winden sich in Agonie und zerbrechen das empfindliche Gerät in Metallsplitter.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You shatter the monitor with a single blow. In its death thralls, the machine envelops you in acrid smoke that leaves behind a thin oily film. The claws holding the data-crypt twitch in agony, breaking the fragile device into metal splinters.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du zerschmetterst den Monitor mit einem einzigen Schlag. In ihren Todeszuckungen taucht die Maschine dich in beißenden Rauch, der einen dünnen öligen Film zurücklässt. Die Klauen, die die Daten-Krypta festhalten, winden sich in Agonie und zerbrechen das empfindliche Gerät in Metallsplitter.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Il vous suffit d'un coup pour détruire l'écran. La machine à l'agonie vous enveloppe d'une fumée âcre qui recouvre tout ce qu'elle touche d'une fine pellicule huileuse. Les griffes qui enserraient la crypte de données tressautent violemment, brisant l'appareil fragile en mille morceaux.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You shatter the monitor with a single blow. In its death thralls, the machine envelops you in acrid smoke that leaves behind a thin oily film. The claws holding the data-crypt twitch in agony, breaking the fragile device into metal splinters.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Il vous suffit d'un coup pour détruire l'écran. La machine à l'agonie vous enveloppe d'une fumée âcre qui recouvre tout ce qu'elle touche d'une fine pellicule huileuse. Les griffes qui enserraient la crypte de données tressautent violemment, brisant l'appareil fragile en mille morceaux.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tek darbede monitörü kırıyorsun. Son bir çırpınışla makine, kokusu barutu andıran ve ardında ince bir tabaka bırakan bir duman yayıyor. Veri mahzenini tutan pençeler acı içinde kıvranıp narin metali hurdaya çeviriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You shatter the monitor with a single blow. In its death thralls, the machine envelops you in acrid smoke that leaves behind a thin oily film. The claws holding the data-crypt twitch in agony, breaking the fragile device into metal splinters.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tek darbede monitörü kırıyorsun. Son bir çırpınışla makine, kokusu barutu andıran bir duman yayıyor ve duman ardında ince bir tabaka bırakıyor. Veri mahzenini tutan pençeler acı içinde kıvranıp narin metali hurdaya çeviriyor.{/n}
